summary: This bill, the SAFEGUARDS Act of 2025, addresses the use of aviation security fees. It aims to ensure that the 9/11 Security Fee, collected from airline passengers, is primarily used for enhancing aviation security. It establishes an Aviation Security Capital Fund and an Aviation Security Checkpoint Technology Fund within the Department of Homeland Security, funded by these fees. The bill mandates specific amounts of the fee revenue be allocated to these funds to improve technology and security measures at airport checkpoints.
